commands.description: Add a new task with description and priority
syntax: Add [task name] with description [description] and category [category] priority [1-3]
Create [task name] with description [description] and category [category] priority [1-3]
New [task name] with description [description] and category [category] priority [1-3]
Insert [task name] with description [description] and category [category] priority [1-3]
